price: 11. Ceux qui ont cru et ont accompli les bonnes œuvres auront des jardins sous lesquels coulent les rivières. Tel est le succès suprême !
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru dhālika al-fawzu al-kabīru
